title: COVID-19 (W2): LGB+MAD
description: Covid-19 Forecasting (Week 2) The covid-19 virus has created a pandemic in the early months of 2020. Kaggle has hosted a series of forecasting competitions for predict the number the spread of the virus. This is my solution for Week 2 of the series. My solution for Week 3: https://www.kaggle.com/rohanrao/covid-19-w3-lgb-mad My solution for Week 4: https://www.kaggle.com/rohanrao/covid-19-w4-lgb-mad I am compiling external datasets in the competition format here: https://www.kaggle.com/rohanrao/covid19-forecasting-metadata They are structured such that it can directly be merged with the train and test datasets on Kaggle.
